normalised: Seaways, huh? Reminds me of that time I tried to take a ferry from Mumbai to Goa. Promised land, right? The tickets were cheap, like rupee eight hundred, but the ride? Oh man, it took a whole twenty four hours! By the time we reached, I looked like I'd aged a decade, felt like I'd sailed the seven seas instead of just the Arabian ones. Never again, bhai. Guess I'll stick to Indigo flights even if they charge rupee five thousand during peak season!
